definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
early evening when lanterns are first lit

sentences.english: Raise the curtain, see the city of lights.
sentences.chinese: 撩起窗帘，看城市的华灯初上。

sentences.english: When the night comes, attesting the busy city of lights.
sentences.chinese: 当黑夜来临，华灯初升的繁华都市。

sentences.english: At night, the city, who in the invisible corner alive?
sentences.chinese: 华灯初上的城市，谁在看不见的角落苟延残喘？

sentences.english: The streets are more beautiful with all the lights on .
sentences.chinese: 华灯齐放，大街更漂亮了。

sentences.english: Against the dazzlingly bright lights lay a dark figure .
sentences.chinese: 令人目眩的华灯之下竟有一副黑暗的躯体。

sentences.english: On the light beginning, oneself still Be go back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 华灯初上，自己依旧在徘徊。

sentences.english: Sitting by the window as the lights turns on, you can keep the wonderful view of the bund.
sentences.chinese: 华灯初上，临窗而坐，整个外滩的景色一览无余。

definition: early evening when lanterns are first lit
(of a city etc) ablaze with lights
lit. flowing light and overflowing color/brilliant lights and vibrant colors (idiom)
night scene/the dim light of night
endless stream of horse and carriages (idiom)/heavy traffic
